lead_paragraph: Muslim activists have raised more than $136,000 in donations after vandalism in Jewish cemeteries and bomb threats at community centers and day schools.
snippet: Muslim activists have raised more than $136,000 in donations after vandalism in Jewish cemeteries and bomb threats at community centers and day schools....

headline.main: Muslims Give Money to Jewish Institutions That Are Attacked
headline.print_headline: As Jewish Institutions Endure Attacks, Muslims Pledge Financial Aid
